languages.text: "Лучше драться в меньшинстве, но знать, что никакая сволочь не прострелит твой затылок, потому что ты "запятнал себя в глазах Императора".
"Better to fight outnumbered, but know that no bastard's going to shoot you in the back of the head because you've 'sullied yourself in the eyes of the Emperor.'"
languages.original_text: "Лучше драться в меньшинстве, но знать, что никакая сволочь не прострелит твой затылок, потому что ты "запятнал себя в глазах Императора".

traits.locale_text: "Better to fight outnumbered, but know that no bastard's going to shoot you in the back of the head because you've 'sullied yourself in the eyes of the Emperor.'"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Better to fight outnumbered, but know that no bastard's going to shoot you in the back of the head because you've 'sullied yourself in the eyes of the Emperor.'"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Better to fight outnumbered, but know that no bastard's going to shoot you in the back of the head because you've 'sullied yourself in the eyes of the Emperor.'"

traits.locale_text: "Better to fight outnumbered, but know that no bastard's going to shoot you in the back of the head because you've 'sullied yourself in the eyes of the Emperor.'"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: “如果能以数量取胜，那自然是最好。不过，确实有必要确保不会有哪个混蛋会突然开枪打爆你的后脑勺，只是因为你‘在帝皇面前玷污了自己’。”
languages.original_text: "Better to fight outnumbered, but know that no bastard's going to shoot you in the back of the head because you've 'sullied yourself in the eyes of the Emperor.'"

traits.locale_text: “如果能以数量取胜，那自然是最好。不过，确实有必要确保不会有哪个混蛋会突然开枪打爆你的后脑勺，只是因为你‘在帝皇面前玷污了自己’。”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: « Au moins, même si on se retrouve en minorité, on est sûrs qu'on se prendra pas un tir dans le dos juste parce qu'on s'est "souillés aux yeux de l'Empereur". »
languages.original_text: "Better to fight outnumbered, but know that no bastard's going to shoot you in the back of the head because you've 'sullied yourself in the eyes of the Emperor.'"

traits.locale_text: « Au moins, même si on se retrouve en minorité, on est sûrs qu'on se prendra pas un tir dans le dos juste parce qu'on s'est "souillés aux yeux de l'Empereur". »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: «Es mejor luchar en inferioridad numérica a sabiendas de que nadie te va a disparar en el cogote porque te has "mancillado ante los ojos del Emperador"».
languages.original_text: "Better to fight outnumbered, but know that no bastard's going to shoot you in the back of the head because you've 'sullied yourself in the eyes of the Emperor.'"

traits.locale_text: «Es mejor luchar en inferioridad numérica a sabiendas de que nadie te va a disparar en el cogote porque te has "mancillado ante los ojos del Emperador"».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: 「劣勢の相手と戦う方がいいけど、”皇帝の瞳に映る自身を汚した”って理由であなたの後頭部を撃ち抜くろくでなしはいないってわかってるわよね」
languages.original_text: "Better to fight outnumbered, but know that no bastard's going to shoot you in the back of the head because you've 'sullied yourself in the eyes of the Emperor.'"

traits.locale_text: 「劣勢の相手と戦う方がいいけど、”皇帝の瞳に映る自身を汚した”って理由であなたの後頭部を撃ち抜くろくでなしはいないってわかってるわよね」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Es ist besser, in Unterzahl zu kämpfen, aber zu wissen, dass einem niemand in den Hinterkopf schießt, weil man sich 'in den Augen des Imperators besudelt hat'."
languages.original_text: "Better to fight outnumbered, but know that no bastard's going to shoot you in the back of the head because you've 'sullied yourself in the eyes of the Emperor.'"

traits.locale_text: "Es ist besser, in Unterzahl zu kämpfen, aber zu wissen, dass einem niemand in den Hinterkopf schießt, weil man sich 'in den Augen des Imperators besudelt hat'."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.original_text: "Better to fight outnumbered, but know that no bastard's going to shoot you in the back of the head because you've 'sullied yourself in the eyes of the Emperor.'"

languages.text: "Sayıca az olabiliriz. En azından aramızda 'kendini İmparator'un gözünde küçük düşürdüğün' bahanesiyle seni sırtından bıçaklayacak şerefsizler olmadığını biliyoruz."
languages.original_text: "Better to fight outnumbered, but know that no bastard's going to shoot you in the back of the head because you've 'sullied yourself in the eyes of the Emperor.'"

traits.locale_text: "Sayıca az olsak da 'kendini İmparator'un gözünde küçük düşürdüğün' bahanesiyle seni sırtından bıçaklayacak şerefsizlerin olmadığını bilmek daha iyi."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion
